page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: The Rademon Horse Trials were started in 1974.They are always held on the last Friday and Saturday in April.They are sponsored by Insurance Brokers called Sumner + Mc Millen and it is not an international competion.It is up to the staff of Sumner and McMillen to set up the jumps each year.The Rademon Horse Trials were started to promote good horseman-ship.Jessica Harrington is one famous person who has been here.In 1985 there were 145 entries.There are 28 fences.The most difficult would be the river because some horses do not like water.
